project.subtitle: Coursework for Artificial Intelligence Fundamentals
project.title: Machine Learning, News Headline to Stock Prediction
desc: Utilized LSTM Machine Learning architecture to predict stock movement based on given news article.
Achieved 76% test accuracy rate in conjunction with fundamental NLP, data augmentation, Word2Vec embedding, and hyperparameter optimization.

project.subtitle: Personal Project
project.title: Stock Trend Forecast Bot
desc: Utilized Python, MATLAB and IEX financial data API to predictively model stock trend graph.
Log-normal stock price distribution, polynomial regression, along with Monte-Carlo simulation are used.
